features: 【Healthy and Safe】: Made from heavy-duty cast-aluminum and finished with non-toxic, healthy and nonstick coating, this pan is designed for safe and healthy cooking without having to worry about any hazardous substances

【Heating Fast & Evenly】: The nonstick frying pan uses induction base technology to evenly distribute heat for fast and energy efficient cooking. Highly conductive stainless steel induction base ensures it works on all stovetops
【Comfortable & Sturdy Handles】: Ergonomically designed handle with anti-scald silicone makes it easier to transfer the pan from one place to another without fear of burning yourself during cooking

【Dishwasher Safe & Easy to Clean】: Not only is the cookware quick to cook with, it is also dishwasher safe and very easy to clean! Hand washing the cookware is recommended as it is really easy to clean
【Service & Guarantee】: If you receive any defective items caused by delivery, please reach out to us via Amazon message. We will offer a 100% refund or a new replacement, ensuring your satisfaction

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Non-Stick Less oil is required and food is easier to release Healthy & Safe Free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAS, lead, cadmium and other toxic substances Easy To Clean Reduces the burden on hands and makes cleaning up after meals is a breeze Next page 1 Non-Stick 2 Healthy & Safe 3 Easy To Clean

Why Buy ASKSCICI Nonstick Frying Pan? This pan is made from 5 layer top-level, hard nonstick material, which is extremely non-stick, so you can make a meal full of flavor with less oil. The most important is that it is super easy to clean. You don't need a dishwasher, just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water, which make cooking not only easier but also more enjoyable. It is medium sized, lightweight and easy to grip, perfect for women who with little strength. The Bakelite handle, anti-scald and easy to grip, feels great in your hand, even in high temperatures. USE & CARE Stay away from metal utensil in cooking as well as steel wools in cleaning. Use high temperature resistant plastic or wood utensils. Clean up with soap, water, soft sponge and wipe with thin film of oil. Suitable for dishwasher at low temperature. NOTE It is normal that there are some scratch lines on stainless steel base, the bottom of the outside need to be polished before they leave factory. ASKSCICI promises to sell 100% new pan.
Fast and even heating Induction Base Design Compatible with all stovetops, including induction, electric and gas. This versatility makes it suitable for any kitchen.

Anti-Scald and Easy to Grip Stay-Cool Handle Effective anti-scald and provides a cool touch during cooking. Makes it easier to transfer the pan from one place to another without worrying about burning yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am pleasantly surprised. This pan is a high quality frying pan. I am especially pleased with the price. Is study, solid handle, sleek design and durability is appealing. Would 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cooking an omelette
reviews.reviewText: Exactly the right size. It is NON-STICK!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan! My family loves egg sandwiches. Until I got this pan, getting them right was hit or miss. A good weight for arthritic hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this skillet! Perfect for cooking eggs, etc.,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Alright. I’ve had a chance to try this out for a few batches of scrambled eggs and just tried an omelet this morning. I like a nice plump-with-fillings sort of omelet and this pan was a pinch too small for that. There wasn’t enough bottom of the pan width for the eggs to spread out enough to provide coverage for the amount of veggies I like. So that’s the 1 star deduction. “Make a less stuffed omelet!” cries the peanut gallery. Surely a possibility, but I’m not a fan of omelets where the innards seem like an afterthought rather than part of a balanced, harmonious breakfast meal. Plenty slick, nonstick-wise. I do use a bit of oil and butter to assist with flavor and slipperiness. I’ve had enough of the soaking and scraping with my stainless pans, and don’t want to be disappointed with this pan so I’ll work up to an oil-less attempt at scrambled eggs later. Not sure what technology some of the nonstick offerings on the market are to justify their $50 to $150 price tags. This one seems much more fairly priced. The handle is advertised as Bakelite, but it has a really nice satiny feel to it and is very comfortable in the hand, making flipping veggies easy when sautéing. Hopefully the seller/manufacturer will offer additional sizes for those folks who want a bit more real estate to work with when crafting omelets. It is deep enough to do some stovetop frying, and would handle smaller portions of French fries. Could probably fit a couple servings of tots, chicken tenders or fish sticks too. No lid included, so you’ll probably want a spatter screen. Thumbs up recommendation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this pan & love it so much... it has been the only one that I've been using.I'm not a professional chef, but really like this pan. It heats well, it cooks well, it cleans easily.Everything that I've made in this pan has come out great... and a quick wipe (AFTER it cools off) got the pan back in shape.Overall, really happy with the pan & happy to recommend
